languages.text: "Но даже эти нечестивцы не смогли прикоснуться к праху Ардженты и ее святой реликвии, Единственной звезде. Ибо упавший корабль, внутри которого покоились мощи святой, позволял лишь праведнейшим из праведных войти под его своды — всех прочих ждала смерть".

"But even those blasphemers could not touch Argenta's ashes or her holy relic, the One Star. For the fallen ship, which now served as the resting place for the saint's remains, would only allow the truly righteous to enter — all others would meet their death."
languages.original_text: "Но даже эти нечестивцы не смогли прикоснуться к праху Ардженты и ее святой реликвии, Единственной звезде. Ибо упавший корабль, внутри которого покоились мощи святой, позволял лишь праведнейшим из праведных войти под его своды — всех прочих ждала смерть".

traits.locale_text: "But even those blasphemers could not touch Argenta's ashes or her holy relic, the One Star. For the fallen ship, which now served as the resting place for the Saint's remains, would only allow the truly righteous to enter — all others would meet their death."

"But even those blasphemers could not touch Argenta's ashes or her holy relic, the One Star. For the fallen ship, which now served as the resting place for the Saint's remains, would only allow the truly righteous to enter — all others would meet their death."

"But even those blasphemers could not touch Argenta's ashes or her holy relic, the One Star. For the fallen ship, which now served as the resting place for the saint's remains, would only allow the truly righteous to enter — all others would meet their death."

"But even those blasphemers could not touch Argenta's ashes or her holy relic, the One Star. For the fallen ship, which now served as the resting place for the saint's remains, would only allow the truly righteous to enter — all others would meet their death."

"But even those blasphemers could not touch Argenta's ashes or her holy relic, the One Star. For the fallen ship, which now served as the resting place for the saint's remains, would only allow the truly righteous to enter — all others would meet their death."

languages.text: “但即使是那些亵渎者，也无法触碰阿洁塔的骨灰或她的圣遗物‘命运之星’。因为那艘坠落的飞船如今已经成为了圣人遗体的安息之地，只有真正心怀正义之人才能进入，其他人只会命丧当场。”
languages.original_text: "But even those blasphemers could not touch Argenta's ashes or her holy relic, the One Star. For the fallen ship, which now served as the resting place for the saint's remains, would only allow the truly righteous to enter — all others would meet their death."

traits.locale_text: “但即使是那些亵渎者，也无法触碰阿洁塔的骨灰或她的圣遗物‘命运之星’。因为那艘坠落的飞船如今已经成为了圣人遗体的安息之地，只有真正心怀正义之人才能进入，其他人只会命丧当场。”

languages.text: «Pero ni siquiera esos blasfemos podrían tocar las cenizas de santa Argenta ni su reliquia, la Estrella Única. La nave caída, que ahora le servía de lugar de descanso, solo permitiría la entrada a los verdaderamente justos. A los demás les esperaba la muerte».
languages.original_text: "But even those blasphemers could not touch Argenta's ashes or her holy relic, the One Star. For the fallen ship, which now served as the resting place for the saint's remains, would only allow the truly righteous to enter — all others would meet their death."

traits.locale_text: «Pero ni siquiera esos blasfemos podrían tocar las cenizas de santa Argenta ni su reliquia, la Estrella Única. La nave caída, que ahora le servía de lugar de descanso, solo permitiría la entrada a los verdaderamente justos. A los demás les esperaba la muerte».

languages.text: 「しかし、神を冒涜する者たちでさえ、アルジェンタの遺灰や聖遺物である一つ星に触れることはできなかった。聖女の遺骸の安置所となっている堕落した船は、真に正しい者しか入ることを許さなかったからだ…そうでない者は、死を迎えることになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "But even those blasphemers could not touch Argenta's ashes or her holy relic, the One Star. For the fallen ship, which now served as the resting place for the saint's remains, would only allow the truly righteous to enter — all others would meet their death."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、神を冒涜する者たちでさえ、アルジェンタの遺灰や聖遺物である一つ星に触れることはできなかった。聖女の遺骸の安置所となっている堕落した船は、真に正しい者しか入ることを許さなかったからだ…そうでない者は、死を迎えることになるだろう」

languages.text: "Aber selbst diese Gotteslästerer konnten Argentas Asche oder ihr heiliges Relikt, den Einen Stern, nicht berühren. Denn das abgestürzte Schiff, das nun als Ruhestatt für die Überreste der Heiligen diente, ließ nur die wahrhaft Rechtschaffenen eintreten – alle anderen erwartete der sichere Tod."
languages.original_text: "But even those blasphemers could not touch Argenta's ashes or her holy relic, the One Star. For the fallen ship, which now served as the resting place for the saint's remains, would only allow the truly righteous to enter — all others would meet their death."

traits.locale_text: "Aber selbst diese Gotteslästerer konnten Argentas Asche oder ihr heiliges Relikt, den Einen Stern, nicht berühren. Denn das abgestürzte Schiff, das nun als Ruhestatt für die Überreste der Heiligen diente, ließ nur die wahrhaft Rechtschaffenen eintreten – alle anderen erwartete der sichere Tod."

languages.text: « Mais même ces blasphémateurs n'ont pas pu mettre la main sur les cendres d'Argenta ni sur sa relique sacrée, l'Étoile unique, car le vaisseau déchu, qui est devenu la dernière demeure de la sainte, n'ouvre ses portes qu'aux vertueux et tue tous les autres. »
languages.original_text: "But even those blasphemers could not touch Argenta's ashes or her holy relic, the One Star. For the fallen ship, which now served as the resting place for the saint's remains, would only allow the truly righteous to enter — all others would meet their death."

traits.locale_text: « Mais même ces blasphémateurs n'ont pas pu mettre la main sur les cendres d'Argenta ni sur sa relique sacrée, l'Étoile unique, car le vaisseau déchu, qui est devenu la dernière demeure de la sainte, n'ouvre ses portes qu'aux vertueux et tue tous les autres. »

languages.text: "Ancak o günahkârlar dahi Argenta'nın küllerine ya da kutsal yadigârı Emsalsiz Yıldız'a el süremedi. Düşen gemi, azizenin kalıntılarına ev sahipliği yapıyor. Rivayete göre gemiye girme hakkı, yalnızca fazilet sahiplerine mahsustur. Kalanlar, ancak ölümlerinin ardından azizeyle tanışma şerefine nail olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "But even those blasphemers could not touch Argenta's ashes or her holy relic, the One Star. For the fallen ship, which now served as the resting place for the saint's remains, would only allow the truly righteous to enter — all others would meet their death."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak o günahkârlar dahi Argenta'nın küllerine ya da kutsal yadigârı Emsalsiz Yıldız'a el süremedi. Düşen gemi, azizenin kalıntılarına ev sahipliği yapıyor. Rivayete göre yalnızca fazilet sahipleri buraya girme hakkına sahip, kalanlar ise ancak ölümlerinin ardından azizeyle tanışma şerefine nail olacak."
